text: @fordnation Doug Ford called citizens who have lost their jobs, businesses, and livelihoods “yahoos”. His ill advised economic shutdown has ruined thousands of lives. 70% of #COVID19 deaths in Ontario have been in long-term care homes. Quarantine the sick not the healthy. Open the economy! https://t.co/tIY5ZzKiQG
